field.name: Description
field.text: Krakens are gargantuan creatures of the deep oceans. Rarely seen, but when they are, they instill panic and will often attack nearby sailing vessels thinking they are their favorite prey (whales). Not a vicious animal naturally.

field.name: Special Abilities

(only works once per day) Striking a Kuan-Ya with a mirror deals damage directly to HP equal to twice its normal fire damge ( 66+1 )

field.name: Statistics
field.text: Immune to fire and poison. Take 1/4 damage from other elemental sources, except water which deals 1/2 damage instead. 200 HP Size: 2 (15' long, but diminished size due to narrow body) Actions: 3 plus 3 moves Attack: 6-6 (bite) Dodge: none Natural Armor: 0/0/0 Base Armor: 5

field.name: Attacks
field.text: Bite 44+10S and 36+1U Fire Tail Whip 44+3C and 36+1U Fire Charge-bite deals double the normal S damage; fire damage is unchanged.

field.name: Description
field.text: Apperance: The Kuan-Ya is an agressive beast whose body is made entirely of fire. It's head resembles that of a dragon or some great lizard or serpent. It glows bright orange and red, and appears to made of flames compressed together in an invisible shell, showing detail including teeth, eyes, and ridges on the forehead. The center of its eyes are two white-hot glowing spots. The remainder of its body is long and serpentine, and is far less detailed. The end of it's tail is nothing other than wild flame. The beast is about fifteen feet long and the body is two feet in diameter at the head, tapering down to the end of the tail. Habits: Kuan-Ya are tempramental, agressive, and mean. Fortunately, their temper is also mercurial and while they are easily provoked, they are also likely to forget about past acts of agression if a new threat presents itself. Kuan-Ya are spirit beings, and therefore they do not need to eat. They are not particularly intelligent. Combat: Kuan-Ya are fearless and charge forward in battle. They use no subterfuge and attack the most convenient opponent directly, biting with their red-hot mouth.

field.name: Special Abilities

field.name: Description
field.text: Appearance: The metal babble is a strange creature whose body looks like an amorphous blob of silvery liquid metal. The creature has a "mound shaped" body about four feet in diameter and two feet thick in the center. Its body is constantly moving and squirming like some sort of huge metal amoeba. The creature makes a noise not ulike a simmering stew as the metal that makes up its body flows about and bubbles. Metal babbles move about like a slug, but they are capable of moving quite rapidly. Habits: Metal Babbles are of very low intelligence. They like dark areas such as old cellars, caves, and underground crypts. They slide about the floor, searching for material to eat. Metal Babbles are capable of eating nearly anything, including stone, dirt, and organic matter. They care little for the taste of meat, though they will eat it in preferance to stone. The Metal Babble's favorite food is metal objects, including coins, weapons, tools and the like. Metal Babbles eat by engulfing their food like an amoeba. Combat: Metal Babbles do not hunt live prey, and they do not persue hostilities of their own accord. However, if disturbed they attack ferociously. Metal Babbles attack by forming their body into living weapons. Their most common attack is to form a spear-like blade and thrust it towards a target. When surrounded by multiple threats, they can form their body into a huge mass of spinning blades, threatening everyone around them. Finally, the creature is able to spew forth a sonic attack of mind-numbing gibberish. All creatures who are within range (and who can hear) are affected by this ability.

field.name: Description
field.text: Apperance: This foul beast resembles a gigantic ignuana. It's body is fifteen feet long, with a tail of similar length. It stands on four heavily muscled legs, ending in sharp claws. The creature's back is bristling with slender, bony spikes that are the size of two-handed swords. An additional four slender arms protrude from the creature's midsection: two on each side. These arms are long and slender and end in clawed hands. Habits: The Necrolisk is a powerful carnivoreit spends its time hunting in order to feed its ravenous appetite. Its only other pastime is sleeping off past meals. Any creature encountered by a Necrolisk is either ignored (in the case of tiny vermin) or categorized as food or as a potential threatin both cases, it is attacked and eaten. The necrolisk is fond of impaling dead prey on its back spikes to store it for later as it relishes the taste of partially-decayed meat. Combat: The Necrolisk is an unsubtle combatant. It charges foes and attacks them with claws, bite, its tail slap. Incapacitated targets are impaled on its back spikes. It us unlikley to back down from a fight unless it is obvious loosing or if it's opponents are particularly flashy and/or larger than it is.

field.name: Description
field.text: Apperance: The Rabbat is frightening beast to behold. It consists of a bulbous central body which is dominated by a single giant eyeball and a huge mouth filled with vicious looking teethleaving no doubt that this beast is a meat eater. Two bat-like wings extend from the central body. It has no other limbs. Habits: Rabbats are aggressive meat eaters. In the wild, they persue and attack anything they think they can kill, which is most creatures. Rabbats are only afraid of very large, powerful, beasts such as Dragons. They may be found in nearly any enviornment, but they tend to lair in caves. Rabbats are much more powerful than they are intelligent, and thus they are sometimes subjugated by powerful wizards for use as minions. Combat: Rabbats are unsubtle and make no use of trickery or deciet. They do, however, know the tactical advantage of staying away from a fight and utilize their ranged spell-like abilities, closing in to bite only when they are clearly winning the fight. They are unlikely to flee except in the most exceptional of circumstances.

field.name: Description

field.name: Description

field.name: Description

field.name: Description
field.text: This is a stand in. A character may take a magical spell of any rank as a Trait. They do not need to buy Magical Control, Spellcasting, Faith, Mysticism, etc. The rank of the specific Trait is the rank of the spell. For purposes of control (striking, LVL, etc.), the level at which the Spell Ability has been purchased is used for these calculations. The cost of using the ability is the same Mana Point cost as the spell itself.

example.text: Ignaceousalter-identity is the mutant superhero, Flame-On!The exclamation point is part of the name.. He has the following Arcane Talents: Fireblast at Level 4, Fire Shards at level 4, Flame Shroud at level 1, Living Fire at level 1, and Flame Whip at level 2. Although he feels it was unnecessary, his secret master has been forcing him to train in the mystic arts to learn to control his powers better (Mysticism, level 3). Although he thinks it's bunk, and wasn't necessary, he can certainly use his powers longer nowadays.

field.text: We note that for Flame Whip, Fire Shards, and Fireblast the description in says to roll to determine if Ignaceous strikes. Ignaceous would roll his level he has purchased the skills at, i.e. levels 2, 4, and 4, respectively.

field.name: Description

field.name: Description

field.text: Strength += 2*Level; Build += 2*Level; Speed -= 1*Level; Intelligence -= 1*Level; Wisdom -= 1*Level; Height *= pow(1.1,Level); Weight *= pow(1.25,Level);

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +1 CHR with respect to dealings of the opposite sex. You recive -1 CHR for dealings with the same sex.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character will not age while the power is activated.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely immune to all diseases (this includes poison type spells as well).

field.name: Description
field.text: Character takes no damage from falling.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character takes no physical damage and may walk through substances. Note that this does NOT grant the character the ability to fly or hover. He must still walk, though he may dive into a substance.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely invisible to visible light. A good minor flaw would be that the character still has a shadow.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +3 to all BLD checks involving acts of endurance

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can absorb up to 5 * Lvl points of damage from kinetic damage (PSC) per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can throw just about anything with amazing force. Thrown objects deal an additional Lvl D 4 P, S, or C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character emits enough light to illuminate (like day) an area up to 5*Lvl2in radius.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely undetectable when within a bright light that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: You earn luck at double the normal rate. However, your max luck is always no more than 2 points.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely immune to all magic attacks and effects (good an bad) with 1 success on Lvl D + 10 (roll for good AND bad spells and effects). This does include magic that is thrown at him.

field.name: Description
field.text: You have a natrual ability to sense the presence of magical abilities and objects. You recive the ability to detect magic as if you had Magical Studies LVL2. If you already have that skill, gain +1 LVL to all your rolls.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can manipulate up toLvl3* 10 pounds of metal. Metal pieces may be thrown for an attack (one action) that deals Lvl D 6 SPC damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can melt into a puddle that can flow through cracks, etc. He still weighs the same, and takes up the same volume. He is COMPLETELY defenseless, and can only move at 1 foot per second. 0 Base Armor and immune to physical attacks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Copy the supernatural abilities from other characters as long as the total cost of the abilities has no more than Lvl * 20 character points.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can move through the substance at a rate of a slow walk. Name the substance at purchase time. Character can take anything he is wearing with him, nothing else.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can make 1 target at a time mute for Lvl turns.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character has some form of natural (or mystical) covering that gives himLvl2PSC protection and Lvl U protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: +1 on all CHR based skill checks and attribute checks. You are -3 to all rolls involving seduction.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can see in absolute darkness for up to Lvl*20 feet

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +3 to CHR-related skill or attribute checks that involve diplomacy and negotiation. You also recive +2 to skill checks related to investigation or detecting lies.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character feels NO pain. He is not adversely affected by hit-point loss (though he still looses HP, and will die when -HP is reached).

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can deal damage to invulnerable creatures.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can control up toLvl2* 10 pounds of plant material. Can be used to attack others (takes one action) with the plants, deals Lvl D 6 C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can take control of another creature if it has fewer character points than he does. His original body appears to be sucked into the new body. If the new body is killed, the character pops back out.

field.name: Description
field.text: Name substance the field is made of. The character is surrounded by a swirling field of substance. Any attacks of this substance that passes through field is reduced to 0 damage. All other damage is reduced by a quarter.

field.name: Description
field.text: Sends the character to a little pocket of reality. He can leave when he wishes, time does not pass outside of pocket. Character still ages within the Reality Pocket.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can regrow any limb at a rate of Lvl pounds per day.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can accelerate the deteriation of organic matter (by a LOT). Character must touch the object. Can rot Lvl pounds of organic matter per second.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character may see anything that is invisible

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can bring himself back to life Lvl number of times. He revives with full abilities, HP, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can detect how many HP the target has.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can detect how many MP the target has.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely undetectable when within a deep shadow that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can change the form of his body. This includes fairly basic transformation, growing hair, changing skin color, shift body mass, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can shift 4*Lvl attribute points around at a time.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character gains Lvl sizes, gains2LvlStrength, looses Lvl Dex, multiply HP and Base Armor by2Lvl.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character sees the world in slow motion. Character gets lvl additional attempts to parry an attack.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +2 to deception, forgery, and social engineering type skill rolls. You recive +1 CHR for purposes of seduction and deception.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can emit and hear VERY high and low pitched sounds (think bats here) as well as very quite or loud sounds. Can be used as an attack that deals Lvl D 4 U damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Take control of LVL spirits whose character points are fewer than your own.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create Lvl clones of himself. Can regenerate a dead clone in a month.

field.name: Description
field.text: Ability to turn into a non-moving statue (name the substance at purchase) at will. Character is COMPLETELY undetectable by ANY means to be anyting but a statue. Statue image and size are what the character looked like upon entering the state.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character steals one ability from the target (requires touch) if that ability cost less than Lvl * 20 cp. If another ability is stolen, the owner of the previous ability gets it back.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can stretch up to Lvl times as long, or 1Lvl times as thin as he currently is. This gives the character an additional 00Lvl*2 personal armor

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create a trail of substance that is used to surf on. The trail must be anchored to something, but can be as long as needed. Speed is 10*Lvl MPH. It takes 40*Lvl damage before it will be destroyed. Name substance when purchased.

field.name: Description
field.text: Purchase per attribute that is at least a 20. Increase the max attribute to 20 +lvl2, and purchase additional points as if the base attribute is 12 the current attribute.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +2 to all Dex checks involving balance, jumping, or remaining standing.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can teleport up toLvl2* 5 miles away that he can see or has been.

field.name: Description
field.text: You do not fall unconcious when you drop below 0 HP

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can transfer Lvl HP to a target per second. Requires Touch

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can transferLvl2* 5 MP to a target per second. Requires Touch

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can initiate a grip that requires a strength of STR+Lvl2. Adds Level to any grappling skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can walk on air. He can walk up air steps, go over air bridges, even create air walls (for himself only).

field.name: Description
field.text: Acts as an 8th level skill in ONE weapon, no other weapon skills may be bought by the character

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can control the weather (basic stuff here, no tornadoes, huricanes, etc) for an area ofLvl2square miles.

field.name: Description
field.text: When whirlwind is active, the character appears to be an opaque tornado (think Tasmanian Devil here). All projectiles will be deflected. Anything that comes in contact with the character will receive 36+2C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can withstand high and low pressure environments. This includes a vacuum and underwater.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can see through any substance that is no more thanLvl2feet thick.

field.name: Description
field.text: 75chance of resisting detection by Radar or Sonar. Uses 3* SIZE PC

field.name: Description
field.text: +5 Camo skill. Mech is invisible to light-based detection when not moving

field.name: Description
field.text: 100chance of working, High manuever missiles have no bonus, can misrepresent radar signiture. 15 PC

field.name: Description
field.text: Communication system that is resistant to jamming and detection

field.name: Description
field.text: Can holdX2slots worth of armor where X is no larger than the size of suit. The pod has2X2armor. If the pod is pierced, the ammo is rendered useless.

field.name: Description
field.text: Choose a human armor, multiply values by Size-1. CP: normal amount * (size-1)

field.name: Description
field.text: Protects the pilot's compartment with 50more armor than the rest of the mecha.

field.name: Description
field.text: Has 10 uses before refill. Each gives 25to fool RADAR sensor or Missile

field.name: Description
field.text: Range ofSize-12150feet. Minimum of 50'. Uses 5 PC per use

field.name: Description
field.text: Can combine with another vehicle, mecha, or power armor

field.name: Description
field.text: 2000' range. 100to interrupt radio, 75to disrupt advanced comm

field.name: Description
field.text: Transforms into something with size -1, no weapons or attribute bonuses are accessible

field.name: Description
field.text: +1 to dodge per chargeGet 10 charges before recharging system

field.name: Description
field.text: mimics jump jets (see that sys) Can only be used 4 times before must be recharged

field.name: Description
field.text: mimics hover system for 1 min. Can only be used once before must be recharged

field.name: Description
field.text: Travel +300 mph for 30 sec. Can only be used once before must be recharged

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives +1 LEVEL to mecha related skills (including piloting, dodge, weapons, ect.)

field.name: Description
field.text: X*10 yard radius. Has 75chance to shut down electronic devices in the area

field.name: Description
field.text: Anyone making an engineering or electrical roll when working on vehicle gets +2

field.name: Description
field.text: Modifications repairs can be done in 1/2 the normal time

field.name: Description
field.text: Size2hours in air supply, rebreather, stops poisons and radiation fallout

field.name: Description
field.text: Protects a certain piece of equipment from electronic effects (EM pulse, Logic Bomb). The sheilding equipment it protects are immune to electronic effects + damage but other types of weapons (bullets, bombs, missiles, lasers, etc.) will destroy BOTH

field.name: Description
field.text: Add +50range to a Jammer. Uses 2 PC

field.name: Description
field.text: Simulates the explosion of the power armor or mecha to give the appearance of death

field.name: Description
field.text: Armor will not catch on fire

field.name: Description
field.text: Has 10 uses before refill. Each gives 25to fool thermal sensor or missile

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives +5 Dex; +1 action/turn. Pilot takes D damage from combat rather than U.

field.name: Description
field.text: Each point of damage done to the force field, 1 PC is used.

field.name: Description
field.text: Gives +2 to: mecha piloting, dodge, use of melee/HtH skills, and dex checks.

field.name: Description
field.text: X*10 yard radius. Anyone seeing flash w/o anti-dazzle looses 2 actions this round

field.name: Description
field.text: Will stop bleeding. Once per "charge" it can give 24+1 HP ( 1000 to refill)

field.name: Description
field.text: X*10 yard radius. 100chance to shut down electronics, 50to destroy them.

field.name: Description
field.text: Everything must be bought for the new form. Can form into ANY other item.

field.name: Description
field.text: +8 Camo skills. Mech is invisible to light-based detection.

field.name: Description
field.text: x1.5 strength and -5 dex with that hand. Used for construction and punching.

field.name: Description
field.text: 50chance of resisting detection by Radar or Sonar

field.name: Description
field.text: Like forcefield, 3 hp per 1 PC. Parry with a skill of 3 or get a +2 to a defensive skill

field.name: Description
field.text: Uses SIZE*100 PC. Allows mech to teleport to location in 1 action.

field.name: Description
field.text: Must be bought for each movement system. 1 movement system is more rugged (GM).

field.name: Description
field.text: Destroys vehicle and pilot if he/she hasn't ejected, or by pilot's command

field.name: Description
field.text: Repairs Size HP per hour (up to half of damage taken). UsesSize2power

field.name: Description
field.text: See shields in the armor section for larger than normal shields

field.name: Description
field.text: Doubles armor. Power: All PC production+Size2

field.name: Description
field.text: Protects a certain piece of equipment. If it is hit by an attack, the armor is damaged rather than the equipment.

field.name: Description
field.text: 50chance of negating active stealth. Only one per vehicle. With 2 systems, 100chance of negating active stealth. Uses 7 power.

field.name: Description
field.text: Increases speed any one movement system by 50, doubles power required.

field.name: Description
field.text: Makes mecha invisible to thermal sensors, cannot be targeted by heat seekers

field.name: Description
field.text: Get +50speed for related form. (more wheeled speed for cars)

field.name: Description
field.text: Requires slots equal to the slot size of a weapon / 5. Minimum of 1 slot

field.name: Description
field.text: Can hold a weapon, weapon takes up no slots. They are easier to destroy

field.name: Description
field.text: Group X weapons together, can be shot in groups or singly. Use bonus of least accurate weapon

field.name: Description
field.text: Removes any negatives while within altered gravity areas (space, underwater, etc)

field.name: Description
field.text: Automatically Loading Cannon An autocannon is similar to a modern semiautomatic rifle, but scaled up to an artillery size weapon. Ammunition is stored in a magazine and the gun automatically loads a new shell after each is fired.

field.name: Description
field.text: Chainguns fire a 16 burst. They are fully automatic weapons, similar to anti-aircraft guns. They are generally belt-fed.

field.name: Description
field.text: A Field Gun is a slow to reload, single shot, gun. A tank cannon or artillery piece would be a classic example. Field guns take one action to reload before they can fire again. Reloading is automated, so the pilot can do something else while waiting.

field.name: Description
field.text: Flechette cannon deals (Class+1)D4+(Class/3) S (Slashing) damage, in bursts of 110. They have 10 AP. Flechette ammunition is 1/10th the size of usual ammunition (thus a pod stores 10x as much ammunition), but costs 5x more.

field.name: Description
field.text: Deals (Class+1)* 46+1U + Fire damage with a radius of (Class+1)*20 feet. An ammunition pod holds 5 grenades, regardless of Class.

field.name: Description
field.text: Alternately, the Long Rail Gun can be carried like a rifle, but has to be manually reloaded with a recovery time if (Class+5) actions. Deals double normal damage, with (Class+10)*20 AP. Requires (Class+1)*10 free energy units from the engines.

field.name: Description
field.text: The progressive vulcan is the most advanced fully automatic weapon available. They fire 46 round bursts. They work on a principle similar to a standard vulcan, except that they have multiple breeches and fire from more than one barrel at a time.

field.name: Description
field.text: In addition to normal damage, the Rail Gun has (Class+4)*10 AP. Requires (Class+1)*3 free units of energy to shoot per turn (from the engines).

field.name: Description
field.text: Mecha Shotgun's deal half the usual damage of a similar weapon of the same size and ammunition, i.e. if it is a 75mm shotgun, then it deals ( 4610 )/2 = 465C (Crushing) damage. Shotguns use 525 rounds per shot, depending upon the set-up of the weapon. Shotguns get a bonus to Strike of 1+(Class+2)/2. The range is 1/4 of the usual weapon range.

field.name: Description
field.text: Uses a very heavy barrel and a much more powerful detonant. Deals (Class+1)/2 (rounded up!) x20 C (Crushing) damage. Has a 100' maximum range. The mecha may not fire while moving or the next action after firing. Recovery time is 3, and requires dextrous, working arms and hands.

field.name: Description
field.text: Vulcans are automatic weapons capable of high rates of fire. They fire 26 bursts. These are multi-barrelled weapons, where the barrels are rotated mechanically.

field.name: Description
field.text: A variant of the Particle Cannon that is tuned for a special defective(non-m-brane modulating) Higgs particle; the effective range on the cannon is unlimited. It's range is literally unlimited, but must be purchased as if it costs 5 Classes above it's normal Class.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon tuned for Slashing and (optionally) OverFire.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon tuned for Higgs-Particles and (optionally) OverFire.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon tuned for Fire and Area Effect.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon tuned for Flame and (optionally) OverFire.

field.name: Description
field.text: A weapon tuned for Pulse and (optionally) OverFire.

field.name: Description
field.text: (Wide Area); an untuned long-firing weapon; uses twice the energy but can be used on up to 3 targets.

field.name: Description
field.text: Has 2 hour of recording time, can take pictures or record video sound

field.name: Description
field.text: Library of particular sounds, filters, active sound suppression, sound source locator

field.name: Description
field.text: Displays more information to the pilot such as range, ETA data, very user-friendly

field.name: Description
field.text: The following items make up this package: Advanced Display, A/V Recorder, Navigation Instruments, Basic RADAR, Broadband Video System, Advanced Audio, Seismic Detector, and Anti-dazzle.

field.name: Description
field.text: Intelligently filters out light and sound that would otherwise startle the pilot

field.name: Description
field.text: Removes all strike negatives with indirect fire weapons, and +1 LEVEL to a skill when defending against artillery or indirect attacks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Allows pilot to listen outside the mecha and speak through a loudspeaker

field.name: Description
field.text: Displays engine power, temperature, fuel levels, (like an auto dash panel)

field.name: Description
field.text: Range of 5 miles, useful for locating larger objects.

field.name: Description
field.text: The following items make up this package: External Camera, Status Monitor, Basic Instruments, Basic Audio Processor, and Lights.

field.name: Description
field.text: Uses 5 Power. Requires LVL 4 mecha piloting. Determines what opponents COULD possibly do and how you can use that information to your benefit. Gives +2 to all your defensive rolls, and +2 to strike with bursts, sprays, and area-effect weapons.

field.name: Description
field.text: Zoom capability, 3-d imaging, UV and low-light night vision system

field.name: Description
field.text: Filter's pilots movements to keep him/her from exposing the suit to attack. -1 Actions per turn. Mecha or power armor takes 25less damage than normal (before being applied to armor)Every turn this is active subtract 2 from your initiave

field.name: Description
field.text: Uses 5 Power. Requires LVL 4 mecha piloting. Determines most likely actions of opponent. Gives +1 level to dodge, block, and parry, and +2 to strike with any kind of melee attack

field.name: Description
field.text: Provides a view outside the cockpit of the mecha

field.name: Description
field.text: Can detect heart beats up to 150 feet away (through walls, etc)

field.name: Description
field.text: Various lights placed around the frame of the suit

field.name: Description
field.text: 50 mile range; uses 5 power when turned on.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can detect presence, general shape, speed, altitude, and direction of metal objects

field.name: Description
field.text: Detect motion around the robot/armor/suit. Reduce ambush penalty by half.

field.name: Description
field.text: 3D Compass, Elevation, artificial horizon, GPS Mapping system

field.name: Description
field.text: Detects seismic activity, or shock from heavy equipment or explosions.

field.name: Description
field.text: Radar-like scanning system; works underground or underwater. Range of 5 miles.

field.name: Description
field.text: Displays damage reports, ammo capacities, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Give [Bonus] to strike. If [Bonus] >= 3 allows for targeting of High Manuever Missiles

field.name: Description
field.text: Can view the heat radiated by objects. Has limited ability to see through objects.

field.name: Description
field.text: Works with your sensors. Will indicate what targets are the biggest threats to you.

field.name: Description
field.text: The above items comprise VERY ADVANCED PACKAGE; +2 to Mecha Piloting
